CustomField.description: P0 - P1 - Trainee (upon joining the company) P2 - Skilled (Confirmed Art Handler level with less than 2 years experience) P3 - Highly Skilled (Team Leader level with more than 2 years experience) P4 - Specialist (Supervisor / Special Projects Lead level with more than 3 years experience) P5 - Trainer (Assistant Operations Manager level and above with more than 5 years experience)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: P0 - P1 - Trainee (upon joining the company) P2 - Skilled (Confirmed Art Handler level with less than 2 years experience) P3 - Highly Skilled (Team Leader level with more than 2 years experience) P4 - Specialist (Supervisor / Special Projects Lead level with more than 3 years experience) P5 - Trainer (Assistant Operations Manager level and above with more than 5 years experience)
CustomField.label: Level of Proficiency
